name: Profire Energy, Inc.
description: Profire Energy, Inc. is a leading provider of burner management systems and related technologies. Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Lindon, Utah, Profire specializes in products and services that enhance the safety, efficiency, and performance of industrial burners and combustion systems in the oil and gas industry. The company's innovative solutions include advanced burner management systems, flame detection systems, and associated components that ensure compliance with safety standards and optimize combustion processes. Profire's commitment to quality and safety has positioned it as a trusted partner for companies seeking to enhance operational efficiency while reducing environmental impact. Through continuous research and development, Profire remains at the forefront of combustion technology, addressing the evolving needs of its clients in a dynamic energy landscape. The company is dedicated to providing exceptional customer service and technical support, ensuring that clients can rely on Profire’s expertise to achieve their operational goals.
